product_name: Chaco Tanana EcoTread Flip-Flops - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Chaco Tanana EcoTread flip-flops pair durable construction with simple, sporty style to keep your feet comfortable in warm, sunny weather. Polyester webbing straps wrap over instep to supply a snug, stable fit. Quick-drying microfiber footbeds manage moisture to keep your feet comfortable all day long. LUVSEAT(TM) X02 platform features thin-profile polyurethane midsoles, which provide superior arch support for all-day wear. 25% recycled rubber outsoles on the Chaco Tanana EcoTread sandals offer nonmarking traction on wet and dry land. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan friendly. Closeout.
short_description: The Chaco Tanana EcoTread flip-flops pair durable construction with simple, sporty style to keep your feet comfortable in warm, sunny weather.
